name: OBGYN by Dr. Prassan Vij
description: Dr. Prassan Vij (MBBS, MD, DNB, MNAMS. FRM) is a renowned Gynaecologist and is the head of department of Reproductive Medicine & Surgery St. Stephens hospital in Delhi. He has done his MBBS and MD (Obstetrics & Gynaecology) from JIPMER Pondicherry, his DNB from the National board and his training in Reproductive Medicine from CMC Vellore.  Dr. Vijs Clinical command over the subject and the enthusiastic teaching sessions are reflective of the range of involvement he has in clinical and academic ventures. Dr. Vij has abundant experience of teaching doctors for Post Graduate Entrance since 16 years. He is at his best when he is speaking to young medicos who are striving to solve the controversies in the subject.  With the launch of this app he aims to make sure you never cram OBGYN again, understand the concepts and fall in love with the subject.  App includes video lectures covering the entire OBGYN, Tests with Video Discussion, Question Bank, Free daily updates and much more.
